name: Med Kit
text: Single use item. This model may use this item during its activation to recover 1 wound

name: Stim Pack
text: Single use item. This model may use this item during its activation to remove 1 condition

name: Command +1
text: This model gets +1 Command Point

name: Leadership Aura
text: Friendly models within 6" may use this model's NE stat instead of their own

name: Reroll Nerve Aura
text: This model and friendly models within 6" may reroll Nerve tests

name: Pass Nerve Aura
text: This model and friendly models within 6" automatically pass Nerve tests

name: Melee Hit Aura
text: This model and friendly models within 6" can re-roll melee hit rolls of 1

name: Ranged Hit Aura
text: This model and friendly models within 6" can re-roll ranged hit rolls of 1

name: Attack Hit Aura
text: This model and friendly models within 6" can re-roll melee and ranged hit rolls of 1

name: Speed Aura
text: This model and friendly models that start their activation within 6" get +1 SP.

name: Range Glitch Aura
text: Whenever an enemy model within 6" attempts to make a ranged attack action, this model may roll 1D6. On a 4+, the ranged attack automatically misses

name: Reroll Nerve All
text: All friendly models may reroll Nerve tests

name: Range Hit Assist
text: Once per round, when another model within 6" of this model performs a ranged attack, that attack gets +1 to hit

name: Ignore Cover Assist
text: Once per round, when another model within 6" of this model performs a ranged attack, that attack may ignore obscured and cover modifiers

name: Recovery -1
text: This model gets -1 on all recovery rolls

name: Camo
text: When targeting this model with a ranged attack, attackers get a -2 modifier for being obscured rather than -1

name: Evade -1
text: All attacks targeting this model get -1 to hit

name: Evade -2
text: All attacks targeting this model get -2 to hit

name: Parry -1
text: Melee attacks targeting this model get -1 to hit

name: Parry -2
text: Melee attacks targeting this model get -2 to hit

name: Dodge -1
text: Ranged attacks targeting this model get -1 to hit

name: Dodge -2
text: Ranged attacks targeting this model get -2 to hit

name: Reroll Incoming Melee Hits
text: All melee attacks targeting this model must re-roll successful hits

name: Steady
text: This model cannot be knocked down

name: Wound on Melee Death
text: If this model is removed from play as the result of a melee attack, the attacking model suffers 1 mortal wound

name: Invulnerable 5+
text: This model has 5+ invulnerable armor

name: Invulnerable 4+
text: This model has 4+ invulnerable armor

name: Armor +1
text: This models AR is improved by 1

name: Incoming AP -1
text: Reduce the AP of all attacks targeting this model by 1 to a minumum of 0

name: Incoming AP -2
text: Reduce the AP of all attacks targeting this model by 2 to a minumum of 0

name: Reflect Melee Wound
text: For each armor roll of a natural 6 against a melee attack, the attacking model suffers 1 mortal wound

name: Reroll Recovery
text: You can reroll recovery rolls for this model

name: Pass Recovery
text: This model automatically passes recovery rolls

name: Resilient
text: This model gets +1 on all recovery rolls

name: Super Resilient
text: Each time this model loses a wound, roll 1D6. On a 5+ the model does not lose that wound

name: Super Resilient D1
text: Each time this model loses a wound to an attack that has D1, roll 1D6. On a 5+ the model does not lose that wound

name: Wounds +1
text: This model gets one additional wound

name: Regeneration
text: Use during the end phase. This model may heal one wound. A model may only use this ability once per round

name: Fear Aura
text: All enemy models suffer -1 to Nerve tests while within 6" of this model

name: Terror Aura
text: All enemy models suffer -2 to Nerve tests while within 6" of this model

name: Intimidating
text: Enemy models must pass a Nerve test before they can declare this model as a charge target

name: Reroll Nerve
text: You can reroll Nerve tests for this model

name: Pass Nerve
text: This model automatically passes Nerve tests

name: Nerve +1
text: This models NE is improved by 1

name: Ranged +1 Hit
text: This model gets +1 to hit for ranged attacks

name: Reroll Ranged
text: This model can re-roll ranged hit rolls of 1

name: Critical Damage +1
text: Ranged hits that roll a natural 6 are resolved with +1 D

name: Double Attack
text: When this model performs a ranged attack action, it may attack twice. Completely resolve the first attack before making the second attack.

name: Prevent Disengage
text: When performing a disengaging attack, you may choose to deal no damage and instead the enemy model's move ends immediately

name: Critical Damage +1
text: Melee hits that roll a natural 6 are resolved with +1 D

name: Critical AP +1
text: Melee hits that roll a natural 6 are resolved with +1 AP

name: Critical AP +4
text: Melee hits that roll a natural 6 are resolved with +4 AP

name: Melee Dice +1
text: This model's melee attacks roll +1D6 attack dice

name: Melee Hit +1
text: This model gets +1 to hit for melee attacks

name: Reroll Melee
text: This model can re-roll melee hit rolls of 1

name: Charge Damage
text: If this model finishes a charge move engaged with the target model, roll 1D6. On a 4+ the target immediately suffers 1 mortal wound.

name: Prevent Disengage
text: When performing a disengaging attack, you may choose to deal no damage and instead the enemy model's move ends immediately

name: Swift Charge
text: This model may move twice its SP when making a Charge action

name: Leaping Charge
text: This model ignores difficult terrain and obstacles when making a Charge action

name: Ignore Terrain
text: This model ignores difficult terrain and obstacles when moving

name: Ignore Falling
text: This model does not suffer falling damage

name: Reposition
text: This model may move 3" at the end of its activation

name: Flying
text: This model ignores other models, difficult terrain and obstacles when moving, and can climb up and down any distance for free

name: Consolidate 6
text: After removing a model from play with a melee attack, this model may immediately move 6"

name: Consolidate 6
text: After performing a charge attack, this model may immediately move 6". This model cannot be targeted by disengaging attacks during this movement

name: Advance Deploy
text: After deploying this model during setup, it may move up to 8"

name: Deep Deploy
text: You may choose not to deploy this model during setup. At the beginning of the start phase of the second round, you must deploy this model in contact with any table edge and more than 6" from an enemy model, then give it the following condition: Stunned: This model only gets 1 short action during its turn, cannot be given an extra action, cannot be re-activated and cannot retaliate; remove this condition at the end of its activation

name: Teleport
text: You may choose not to deploy this model during setup. At the beginning of the start phase of the second round, you must deploy this model anywhere on the table more than 6" from an enemy model, then give it the following condition: Stunned: This model only gets 1 short action during its turn, cannot be re-activated and cannot retaliate; remove this condition at the end of its activation

name: Hidden Deployment
text: When deploying this model during setup, you may give it the following condition: Hidden: This model may not be targeted by ranged attacks; this condition ends if the model performs any action or at the beginning of the second round
